about.title: About Us
about.content: Chengdu Bar Calendar is your guide for exploring Chengdu's vibrant drinking culture. We are dedicated to providing locals and visitors with the most comprehensive and up-to-date information on cocktails, craft beer and spirits. Whether you're a seasoned aficionado, a curious traveler, or an industry professional, we'll introduce you to the best bar events, tastings, special promotions, and industry news in Chengdu. Join us on this exciting journey to discover Chengdu's lively bar culture.
